text: Colobothea meleagrina is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Wilhelm Ferdinand Erichson in 1847. IT is known from Bolivia, Ecuador and Peru.BioLib.cz - Colobothea meleagrina. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1847
title: Colobothea meleagrina
